mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORIGINAL(ID, GAMETIME, INSERTTIME, TIER, MATCHID, TOPID, JUNGLEID, MIDDLEID, BOTTOMID, UTILITYID, COMSAVEID, TEAMID, WIN, STATUS) VALUES(ORIGINAL_AUTOINC.NEXTVAL, #{gameTime}, #{insertTime}, #{tier}, #{matchId}, #{topId}, #{jungleId}, #{middleId}, #{bottomId}, #{utilityId}, #{comSaveId}, #{teamId}, #{win}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM COMSAVE WHERE TOPID= #{topId} AND JUNGLEID= #{jungleId} AND MIDDLEID= #{middleId} AND BOTTOMID= #{bottomId} AND UTILITYID= #{utilityId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMSAVE(ID, TOPID, JUNGLEID, MIDDLEID, BOTTOMID, UTILITYID) VALUES(COMSAVE_AUTOINC.NEXTVAL, #{topId}, #{jungleId}, #{middleId}, #{bottomId}, #{utilityId})
INSERT INTO SUMMONERLIST(ID, TIER, SUMMONERID, SUMMONERNAME, STATUS) VALUES(SUMMONERLIST_AUTOINC.NEXTVAL, #{tier}, #{summonerId}, #{summonerName}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT SUMMONERID, TIER, STATUS FROM SUMMONERLIST WHERE ID= #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE SUMMONERLIST SET STATUS= #{status} WHERE ID= #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT MATCHID FROM ORIGINAL WHERE MATCHID= #{matchId} GROUP BY MATCHID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALLTIER(ID, TIER, WIN, COMSAVEID) SELECT ALLTIER_AUTOINC.NEXTVAL, TIER, WIN, COMSAVEID FROM ORIGINAL WHERE STATUS= #{sign}
mapper.update: UPDATE ORIGINAL SET STATUS= #{o_sign} WHERE STATUS= #{x_sign}
